title: 607. Looking Back at Daniel Jones & DK Metcalf's Scouting Reports
itunes:title: 607. Looking Back at Daniel Jones & DK Metcalf's Scouting Reports
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys give their takeaways from the MNF game between the Buccaneers and Giants (2:21). After that, DJ looks back at his scouting report on Giants QB Daniel Jones from when he was coming out of Duke and then the pair examine all of Daniel Jones, Carson Wentz and Kirk Cousins' interceptions this season (8:44). Next, the duo discuss how well Bengals QB Joe Burrow is playing in his rookie year (23:16). Then, the guys hit on which trades they like as the trade deadline approaches (27:36). To wrap up the show, DJ and Bucky explain why scouts miss on players, while focusing on Seahawks WR DK Metcalf as DJ pulls out his initial scouting report on him (35:45).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
